name: Animal Friendship
description: You murmur a charm carried on a breeze only beasts can sense. Choose one non-hostile beast that can see and hear you. The creature must succeed on a Wisdom saving throw or become charmed for the duration. While charmed, it treats you as a trusted companion and will carry out simple commands within its natural ability, such as scouting ahead, carrying small items, or alerting you to danger.
components: V, S, M (a tuft of fur or feather)
